00292 template <typename T>
00293 memory1d<T>::memory1d( device const& dev, size_type size ) : device_pointer_(0), size_(size) {

00298 template <typename T>
00299 memory1d<T>::memory1d( device const& dev, int init_value, size_type size ) : device_pointer_(0), size_(size) {
00300         malloc();
00301         set(init_value);
00302 }

00305 template <typename T>
00306 memory1d<T>::memory1d( device const& dev, T const* data, size_type size ) : device_pointer_(0), size_(size) {
00307         malloc();
00308         copy_to_device(data);
00309 }

00315         malloc();
00316         copy_to_device(first, last);

00334         copy_to_device(other);

00338 template <typename T>
00339 void memory1d<T>::swap( memory1d& other ) {
00340         std::swap(this.device_pointer_, other.device_pointer_);
00341         std::swap(this.size_, other.size_);
00342 }

00345 template <typename T>
00346 typename memory1d<T>::size_type memory1d<T>::size() const {
00347         return size_;
00348 }

00350 
00351 template <typename T>
00352 void memory1d<T>::set(int value) {
00353         if (cudaMemset( static_cast<void*>( device_pointer_ ), value, sizeof(T)*size() ) != cudaSuccess) {
00354                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00355         }
00356 }
00357 
00358 
00359 template <typename T>
00360 void memory1d<T>::malloc() {
00361         if (cudaMalloc( static_cast<void**>( &device_pointer_ ), sizeof(T)*size() ) != cudaSuccess) {
00362                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00363         }
00364 }
00365 
00366 
00367 template <typename T>
00368 void memory1d<T>::free() {
00369         if (cudaFree(device_pointer_) != cudaSuccess) {
00370                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00371         }
00372 }

00374 
00375 template <typename T>
00376 template <typename InputIterator>
00377 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_device( InputIterator first, InputIterator last, int offset ) {
00378         std::vector<T> temp;
00379         temp.assign(first, last);
00380         copy_to_device(temp.size(), &temp[0], offset);
00381 }
00382 
00383 
00384 template <typename T>
00385 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_device( T const* data, int offset ) {
00386         copy_to_device(size(), data, offset);
00387 }
00388 
00389 
00390 template <typename T>
00391 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_device( size_type count, T const* data, size_type offset) {
00392         if (count + offset > size()) {
00393                 throw exception::memory_access_violation();
00394         }
00395         
00396         if ( cudaMemcpy(device_pointer_+offset, data, count * sizeof(T), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice) != cudaSuccess) {
00397                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00398         }
00399 }
00400 
00401 template <typename T>
00402 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_device (memory1d const& other, size_type offset) {
00403         copy_to_device(other, other.size(), offset);
00404 }
00405 
00406 
00407 template <typename T>
00408 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_device (memory1d const& other, size_type count, size_type offset) {
00409         if (count+offset > size()) {
00410                 throw exception::memory_access_violation();
00411         }
00412 
00413         if ( cudaMemcpy(device_pointer_+offset, other.device_pointer_, count * sizeof(T), cudaMemcpyDeviceToDevice) != cudaSuccess) {
00414                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00415         }
00416 }
00417 
00418 
00419 template <typename T>
00420 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_host (T* destination) {
00421         if (cudaMemcpy(destination, device_pointer_, size() * sizeof(T), cudaMemcpyDeviceToHost) != cudaSuccess) {
00422                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00423         }
00424 }
00425 
00426 
00427 template <typename T>
00428 template <typename OutputIterator>
00429 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_host(OutputIterator out_iter) {
00430         std::vector<T> temp( size() );
00431 
00432         copy_to_host(&temp[0]);
00433 
00434         std::copy(temp.begin(), temp.end(), out_iter);
00435 }

00438 #if defined(__CUDACC__)
00439         template <typename T>
00440         T& memory1d<T>::operator[](size_type index) {
00441                 return device_pointer_[index];
00442         }
00443 #endif
00444 
00445 
00446 template <typename T>
00447 T const& memory1d<T>::operator[](size_type index) const {
00448 #if defined(__CUDACC__)
00449         return device_pointer_[index];
00450 #endif
00451 #if !defined(__CUDACC__)
00452         T returnee;
00453         copy_to_device(1, &returnee, index);
00454         return returnee;
00455 #endif
00456 }
